category.name: Active Workspace Search
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AWC_Search_Enable_Snippets
preference.preference_description: A logical preference when set to true will return snippets in Search location Primary work area( object tile ). Before this, need to set global constant "Awp0StoreDatasetContent" in BMIDE to true and re-index all the datasets.
